item.title: Samsung Teases Gap-Free Hinge on Galaxy Z Flip 5
item.description: Samsung Teases Gap-Free Hinge on Galaxy Z Flip 5 Source: 9to5Google - Link to Article Days ahead of the Galaxy Z Flip 5’s launch, Samsung is teasing its newly-designed hinge system, which is expected to eliminate the “hinge-gap” issue seen in previous generations. The Galaxy Z Flip 5 is set to offer significant upgrades compared to its predecessor. The front display will be over three inches, more than double the size of the Z Flip 4’s outer display.
